title: Is 1v5 with Katarina possible?
body: I have seen many people playing Katarina and earn pentakills. Sometimes, the QEW combo does not kill the enemy. I wonder how they can solo the whole enemy team when her spells are on cooldown. I know this is possible if the Katarina is fed but what do you do during early game to get fed?

replies.body: You have ultimate to help for early kills. You can't solo the enemy team if you're not fed. If she could it would be broken, because her combos aren't that hard to pull off.

I actually tried using her a couple times. I was on solo mid. I could not kill Annie, when I landed my ult after the QEW combo, she ran away with very little HP and that was really annoying. Plus, she summoned Tibbers straight away once, forcing me to run away and got killed.

"what do you do during early game to get fed?" you verse noobs. outside of that the only time kats can get strong are when the enemies make mistakes that you can capitalise on. specifically in the early game like 1-5 shes one of the weakest laners so its best to be really patient during that time and dont try anything fancy until you feel you get a better feel for her. why am i helping someone who wants to play kat.....
well I went against a fed Katarina like 1 hour ago and she got a penta...
